testsuite.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests
Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0001. Users should be able to declare environment variables description on pipeline steps configuration. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0001. Users should be able to declare environment variables description on pipeline steps configuration. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0002. Users should be able to declare a list of possible values for environment variables on pipeline steps configuration. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0002. Users should be able to declare a list of possible values for environment variables on pipeline steps configuration. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0003. Users should be able to declare a default value for environment variables on pipeline steps configuration. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0003. Users should be able to declare a default value for environment variables on pipeline steps configuration. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0004. Users should be able to declare if an environment variable on a pipeline step configuration allows custom values to be entered by the user when triggering a new run. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0004. Users should be able to declare if an environment variable on a pipeline step configuration allows custom values to be entered by the user when triggering a new run. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0005. Users should be able to declare an environment variable on a pipeline step configuration that has an empty default value. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0005. Users should be able to declare an environment variable on a pipeline step configuration that has an empty default value. Pipeline Sync should succeed and running the pipeline should get a success result.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0011. Users should not be able to declare a default value that is not part of values on a step configuration environment variable. Pipeline Sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0011. Users should not be able to declare a default value that is not part of values on a step configuration environment variable. Pipeline Sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0012. Users should not be able to declare an empty environment variable on a step configuration. Pipeline Sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0012. Users should not be able to declare an empty environment variable on a step configuration. Pipeline Sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0013. Users should not be able to declare values that are not an array on a step configuration environment variable. Pipeline Sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0013. Users should not be able to declare values that are not an array on a step configuration environment variable. Pipeline Sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0014. Users should not be able to declare an environment variable that has no default value on a step configuration. Pipeline Sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0014. Users should not be able to declare an environment variable that has no default value on a step configuration. Pipeline Sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_BASH - 6 out of 7 - steps environment variable tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3727 Validate step environment variables configuration S_B_Generic_0015. Environment variables declared on steps that do not support custom values should be exported as read only.
testcase.classclass: S_B_Generic_0015. Environment variables declared on steps that do not support custom values should be exported as read only.
